layout.singingstanza: Re -- mem -- ber, re -- mem -- ber, Re -- mem -- ber God made you. Re -- mem -- ber, re -- mem -- ber, That He loves you too. While your legs can run so fast And can hop and skip, Re -- mem -- ber, re -- mem -- ber, Re -- mem -- ber God made you.

lyrics.stanza: Remember, remember, Remember God made you. Remember, remember, That He loves you too.
While your legs can run so fast And can hop and skip, Remember, remember, Remember God made you.
While your arms can turn a rope And can throw a ball, Remember, remember, Remember God made you.
While your ears hear chirping birds And quacking ducks, Remember, remember, Remember God made you.
While your eyes see butterflies And tiny ants, Remember, remember, Remember God made you.
